english.segment1: I stalked serenity with blind obsession. and found possession as I lost control. The secret vice that proclaimed my freedom. is now a slavery thats all my own
english.segment2: My Own. My Own. My Own
english.segment3: Im powerless to this voice. Ill never prevail alone
english.segment4: Desperate. We will proclaim. That on our knees. Were not ashamed. So we bow it to. bow it to. Kneel before you. Just like a child here Im not ashamed. No, were not ashamed
english.segment5: And so in urgency we now concede. That we are helpless in this undertow. Cause in surrender now there just might be. a new serenity thats all my own
